title: Destroyer
brief_description: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who was placed undercover with a Californian gang with tragic results. When the leader re-emerges years later, she must work her way back into her own history to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.

constellations_other.name: 1960s television
constellations_other.description: After its debut in the fifties, Australians rapidly became enthusiastic television viewers in the sixties as American imports started to be mixed with notable local productions.

description: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who, as a young cop, was placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results. When the leader of that gang re-emerges many years later, she must work her way back through the remaining members and into her own history with them to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.
description_for_label: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who, as a young cop, was placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results. When the leader of that gang re-emerges many years later, she must work her way back through the remaining members and into her own history with them to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.
